definition: Yantian district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong

Yantian district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong

sentences.english: The salt pans at Maras, in use since pre-Inca days.
sentences.chinese: 在马拉什的盐田，在自前印加天使用。

sentences.english: To the south east of the Quinta lies the Rio Formosa Estuary, which has extensive salt pans.
sentences.chinese: 在南面的金塔东邻约台塑口，其中有广泛的盐田。

sentences.english: In salina there exist many varieties of living beings which form a ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: 盐田中存在着各种不同的生物，组成了一个生态系统。

sentences.english: Beach swimming, Yantian District, Sha Tau Kok, 30 minutes by car.
sentences.chinese: 海滨游泳，盐田区沙头角，车程30分钟。

sentences.english: Every monsoon their salt fields are washed away, as the desert turns into sea.
sentences.chinese: 季风来临的时候，雨水把盐田冲毁，沙漠变成泽国。
